eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Class ChangeNotification<T extends FileAccess>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<java.util.List<FileChangeInfo>>
      • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm.ChangeNotification<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - a concrete file access object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<java.util.List<FileChangeInfo>>, hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer<java.util.List<FileChangeInfo>>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ChangeNotification<T extends FileAccess>
extends hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<java.util.List<FileChangeInfo>>
implements java.io.Closeable
    A poll based local or remote file change notifier. Clients should register to this class as observers and they will receive the list of changed files.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.06.
